title: World Teachers Day Seminar: Teachers at Risk - Teachers Resisting
content: Home » Conferences and events » Events The NUT along with Amnesty International and UCU will be hosting this year’s World Teachers’ Day event on Monday 5th October from 6pm-9pm at Amnesty International, Human Rights Action Centre. Come along to a panel discussion focused on the struggles of teachers in Bahrain, Colombia, and more. Guest speakers will include Kate Allen, Director, Amnesty International and Christine Blower, General Secretary, National Union of Teachers. Information on further speakers to follow. To register to attend please go to https://wtd2015.eventbrite.co.uk
